message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250, which still leaves some room for both of us to benefit.  Let me know if you're interested in this price.

Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I understand the value of the product, but I am unable to meet the price of $9,250. I would like to propose $9,100 as a counteroffer. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
